title: Matches requests where PII categorized as "EMAIL_ADDRESS" or "IBAN_CODE" was detected:
content:
(cf.llm.prompt.pii_detected and any(cf.llm.prompt.pii_categories[*] in {"EMAIL_ADDRESS" "IBAN_CODE"}))
```
